extendedInfo.description: Create and play your own pinball game!Slideball Construction Set is the first Android application that allows you to design and build your own pinball table.Position bumpers, targets, drop holes, and walls/obstacles wherever you want them.Play your new table. Change it.  Play it again.You have unprecedented control over how your game looks and plays.You'll use a paddle to keep the ball in play.  Just drag the paddle from side to side at the bottom of the screen to keep the pinball in play.Easy to use, fun to play!There are even three example tables with objects from the premier version of SCS!You build it, you get to decide.  You get to have the fun.View it in action at: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kLHdsaywJP0
